Package com.google.cloud.dataproc.v1

Interface JobControllerGrpc.AsyncService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobControllerGrpc.JobControllerImplBase
    Enclosing class:
    JobControllerGrpc
    public static interface JobControllerGrpc.AsyncService
     The JobController provides methods to manage jobs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void cancelJob​(CancelJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
      Starts a job cancellation request.
      default void deleteJob​(DeleteJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<com.google.protobuf.Empty> responseObserver)
      Deletes the job from the project.
      default void getJob​(GetJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
      Gets the resource representation for a job in a project.
      default void listJobs​(ListJobsRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<ListJobsResponse> responseObserver)
      Lists regions/{region}/jobs in a project.
      default void submitJob​(SubmitJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
      Submits a job to a cluster.
      default void submitJobAsOperation​(SubmitJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<com.google.longrunning.Operation> responseObserver)
      Submits job to a cluster.
      default void updateJob​(UpdateJobRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
      Updates a job in a project.

    • Method Detail

      • submitJob

        default void submitJob​(SubmitJobRequest request,
                       io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
         Submits a job to a cluster.

      • submitJobAsOperation

        default void submitJobAsOperation​(SubmitJobRequest request,
                                  io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<com.google.longrunning.Operation> responseObserver)
         Submits job to a cluster.

      • getJob

        default void getJob​(GetJobRequest request,
                    io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
         Gets the resource representation for a job in a project.

      • listJobs

        default void listJobs​(ListJobsRequest request,
                      io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<ListJobsResponse> responseObserver)
         Lists regions/{region}/jobs in a project.

      • updateJob

        default void updateJob​(UpdateJobRequest request,
                       io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
         Updates a job in a project.

      • cancelJob

        default void cancelJob​(CancelJobRequest request,
                       io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<Job> responseObserver)
         Starts a job cancellation request. To access the job resource
 after cancellation, call
 [regions/{region}/jobs.list](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.regions.jobs/list)
 or
 [regions/{region}/jobs.get](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.regions.jobs/get).

      • deleteJob

        default void deleteJob​(DeleteJobRequest request,
                       io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<com.google.protobuf.Empty> responseObserver)
         Deletes the job from the project. If the job is active, the delete fails,
 and the response returns `FAILED_PRECONDITION`.
